channel.title: Information theory on Energy = Milk · Coffee^2
channel.description: Recent content in Information theory on Energy = Milk · Coffee^2

item.title: Note on Information Theory
item.description: I began a project with Dr. Bu on topic of quantum information geometry in summer of 2023. The following note is a short summary of Information Theory From Coding to Learning by Yury Polyanskiy and Yihong Wu plus self-contained preliminaries on probability theory. Note on Information Theory.
